title: Trump on Boris Johnson: ‘Don’t worry about him, he’s going to be OK’
text:
U.S. President Donald Trump | Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images Trump on Boris Johnson: ‘Don’t worry about him, he’s going to be OK’ UK PM is ‘fighting and he knows how to win,’ says US president.

Boris Johnson needs all the help he can get right now, so thank goodness for his friend in the White House.

Asked about the trials the new U.K. prime minister has faced since taking office, Donald Trump told reporters in the Oval Office: "Boris is a friend of mine and he's going at it, there's no question about it," ABC News reported.

"I watched him this morning, he's in there fighting and he knows how to win. Boris knows how to win. Don't worry about him, he's going to be OK."

Pres. Trump responds to upheaval against British Prime Minister Boris Johnson amid "Brexit" turmoil: "He's going at it... he's in there fighting, and he knows how to win. Boris knows how to win. Don't worry about him, he's going to be ok." https://t.co/f9pfFSRBjK pic.twitter.com/3o2iYAR4Ev — ABC News (@ABC) September 4, 2019

Last week, Trump described Johnson as "exactly what the U.K. has been looking for."
description: UK PM is ‘fighting and he knows how to win,’ says US president.
